root.texto: Did your invitation to Windsor Castle get lost in the mail? Look at her bringing CP time to the monarchy.‚Äù - @onlychyld #RoyalWedding #HarryAndMeghan https://t.co/KBO0HG53zs ‚ÄúGod is love, and all who live in love live in God, and God lives in them.‚Äù #RoyalWedding #HarryAndMeghan https://t.co/6D4zws9u8K May all your future husbands look at you like Harry looks at Meghan. #RoyalWedding #HarryAndMehgan https://t.co/tJqHOt16n6 Does anyone object to this union?? #RoyalWedding #HarryAndMeghan https://t.co/sNdkw4MYWC ‚ÄúI wonder if there will be fish and chips at the reception.‚Äù #RoyalWedding #HarryAndMeghan https://t.co/jGzEbrU8oD ‚ÄúWe must discover the power of love, the power, the redemptive power of love.‚Äù #RoyalWedding #HarryAndMeghan https://t.co/ngpm8sEKDa There‚Äôs a black pastor quoting MLK and mentioning negro spirituals at the #RoyalWedding https://t.co/GhEzmwsN3k When love is the way there‚Äôs plenty good room for all of God‚Äôs children because when love is the way, we actually treat each other like we‚Äôre actually family.
